description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第四任大汗，元朝追尊为宪宗桓肃皇帝。其在位期间发动了对南宋、大理、西亚等地的征服战争，但在征伐南宋的钓鱼城之战中去世，他的死引发了帝国分裂。
description.en: The fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, posthumously honored as Emperor Xianzong Huansu by the Yuan Dynasty. During his reign, he launched wars of conquest against the Southern Song, Dali, and West Asia. He died during the Battle of Diaoyu Fortress while invading the Southern Song, and his death triggered the division of the empire.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗的第四子，蒙哥、忽必烈、旭烈兀、阿里不哥的父亲。
description.en: The fourth son of Genghis Khan, and the father of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的正妻，蒙哥、忽必烈、旭烈兀、阿里不哥的母亲，在推举蒙哥称汗的过程中起到了关键作用。
description.en: The chief wife of Tolui, mother of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke, who played a key role in the enthronement of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的奠基者与首任大汗，蒙哥的祖父。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the grandfather of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第二任大汗，成吉思汗第三子，蒙哥的养父。
description.en: The second Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, third son of Genghis Khan, and the adoptive father of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 窝阔台的皇后，负责抚育蒙哥长大。
description.en: A queen of Ögedei Khan, responsible for raising Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的弟弟，蒙古帝国第五任大汗，元朝的创建者。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, the fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the founder of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的弟弟，伊儿汗国的建立者，领导了第三次蒙古西征。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, founder of the Ilkhanate, who led the third Mongol invasion of the West.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的弟弟，在蒙哥去世后与忽必烈争夺汗位。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, who contended with Kublai for the khanship after Möngke's death.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗长子术赤之子，金帐汗国的建立者，是推举蒙哥称汗的关键人物。
description.en: Son of Jochi, the eldest son of Genghis Khan, founder of the Golden Horde, and a key figure in the election of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 拔都的弟弟，率军护送并支持蒙哥召开忽里台登基。
description.en: Younger brother of Batu Khan, who led an army to escort and support Möngke's enthronement at the Kurultai.

description.zh-cn: 贵由的皇后，在贵由死后临朝称制，反对蒙哥继位，后被处死。
description.en: Wife of Güyük Khan, who acted as regent after his death, opposed Möngke's succession, and was later executed.

description.zh-cn: 由成吉思汗建立的帝国，蒙哥是其第四位大汗。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan, of which Möngke was the fourth Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古的宗王和大臣们的议事会，用于决定重大问题，如选举大汗。
description.en: A council of Mongol princes and nobles to decide major issues, such as the election of a Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第二次向西方的远征，蒙哥参与其中并建立了战功。
description.en: The second Mongol invasion of the West, in which Möngke participated and achieved military merit.

description.zh-cn: 钦察部落首领，在第二次蒙古西征中被蒙哥活捉。
description.en: A leader of the Kipchaks, captured alive by Möngke during the second Mongol invasion of the West.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的弟弟，蒙古帝国第五任大汗，元朝的创建者。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, the fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the founder of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于今中国云南地区的政权，被忽必烈奉蒙哥之命所灭。
description.en: A kingdom located in modern-day Yunnan, China, which was conquered by Kublai under Möngke's orders.

description.zh-cn: 大理国末代国王，投降蒙古后被任命为大理总管。
description.en: The last king of the Dali Kingdom, who surrendered to the Mongols and was appointed as the General Administrator of Dali.

description.zh-cn: 由旭烈兀领导的蒙古帝国第三次西征，征服了西亚大片地区，建立了伊儿汗国。
description.en: The third Mongol invasion of the West, led by Hulagu, which conquered large parts of West Asia and established the Ilkhanate.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的伊斯兰教派国家，于1256年被旭烈兀西征军所灭。
description.en: An Islamic sectarian state in West Asia, destroyed by Hulagu's army in 1256.

description.zh-cn: 以巴格达为首都的伊斯兰哈里发国，于1258年被旭烈兀西征军所灭。
description.en: The Islamic caliphate centered in Baghdad, destroyed by Hulagu's army in 1258.

description.zh-cn: 位于叙利亚地区的王朝，于1260年被旭烈兀西征军所灭。
description.en: A dynasty in the region of Syria, destroyed by Hulagu's army in 1260.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古四大汗国之一，由旭烈兀在西亚建立。
description.en: One of the four major khanates of the Mongol Empire, established in West Asia by Hulagu.

description.zh-cn: 中国南方的汉人政权，蒙哥在位期间对其发动大规模进攻。
description.en: A Han Chinese dynasty in southern China, which was subjected to a large-scale invasion during Möngke's reign.

description.zh-cn: 南宋与蒙古在钓鱼城的一场关键战役，蒙古大汗蒙哥在此战中身亡。
description.en: A key battle between the Southern Song and the Mongols at Diaoyu Fortress, where the Great Khan Möngke died in action.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥去世后，其弟忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺汗位而爆发的内战，导致蒙古帝国分裂。
description.en: A civil war that broke out after Möngke's death between his brothers Kublai and Ariq Böke for the succession to the khanship, leading to the division of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 法国传教士，受路易九世派遣出使蒙古，并觐见了蒙哥汗。
description.en: A French missionary sent by Louis IX on a mission to the Mongol Empire, where he had an audience with Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王，派遣传教士卢布鲁克出使蒙古。
description.en: King of France who dispatched the missionary William of Rubruck on a mission to the Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 小亚美尼亚国王，归附蒙古帝国，曾亲自前往哈拉和林觐见蒙哥。
description.en: King of Armenian Cilicia, who submitted to the Mongol Empire and personally traveled to Karakorum for an audience with Möngke.

description.zh-cn: 由忽必烈建立的中国朝代，追尊蒙哥为宪宗桓肃皇帝。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Kublai Khan, which posthumously honored Möngke as Emperor Xianzong Huansu.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的大皇后，弘吉剌部人。
description.en: The chief empress of Möngke Khan, from the Onggirat tribe.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的长子，由忽都台皇后所生。
description.en: The eldest son of Möngke Khan, born to Empress Qutuqtai.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的次子。
description.en: The second son of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的三子，由忽都台皇后所生。
description.en: The third son of Möngke Khan, born to Empress Qutuqtai.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的四子。
description.en: The fourth son of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 以蒙哥为养子，并由其皇后昂灰抚育长大。
description.en: Adopted Möngke as his son, and had his queen Anghui raise him.

description.zh-cn: 在蒙哥死后，为争夺汗位爆发拖雷家族内战。
description.en: After Möngke's death, they fought in the Toluid Civil War for the succession to the khanship.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是蒙古帝国第四任大汗。
description.en: Möngke was the fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 以长支宗王的身份召集忽里台，极力称赞并推举蒙哥为大汗。
description.en: As the senior prince, he convened a Kurultai and strongly praised and nominated Möngke to be the Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 奉其兄拔都之命，率大军随同蒙哥前往斡难河畔召开忽里台，以武力确保蒙哥顺利登基。
description.en: Under his brother Batu's order, he led a large army to accompany Möngke to the Kurultai on the Onon River, ensuring his successful enthronement with military force.

description.zh-cn: 命其子蒙哥应召参与拔都召开的忽里台，并利用其威望笼络多数宗王大臣支持蒙哥登基。
description.en: She ordered her son Möngke to attend the Kurultai convened by Batu and used her prestige to persuade the majority of princes and ministers to support Möngke's enthronement.

description.zh-cn: 在斡难河畔举行的忽里台大会上，宗王大臣共同拥戴蒙哥登基成为大汗。
description.en: At the Kurultai held on the banks of the Onon River, the princes and ministers jointly acclaimed Möngke's accession as Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 钦淑皇后作为窝阔台系的代表反对蒙哥即位，在蒙哥巩固汗位时被其母唆鲁禾帖尼下令处死。
description.en: As a representative of the Ögedeid line, Oghul Qaimish opposed Möngke's accession and was executed by order of Möngke's mother Sorghaghtani while Möngke was consolidating his power.

description.zh-cn: 为了巩固其子蒙哥的汗位，亲自下令处死反对者贵由汗的皇后斡兀立海迷失。
description.en: To consolidate her son Möngke's throne, she personally ordered the execution of the opponent Oghul Qaimish, the empress of Güyük Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥年轻时参与第二次蒙古西征，征讨钦察、斡罗思等地，屡立战功。
description.en: In his youth, Möngke participated in the second Mongol invasion of the West, campaigning against the Kipchaks and Rus', and repeatedly achieved military merit.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次蒙古西征期间，于里海附近活捉钦察首领八赤蛮。
description.en: During the second Mongol invasion of the West, he captured the Kipchak leader Bachman alive near the Caspian Sea.

description.zh-cn: 任命其弟忽必烈统领漠南汉地军政事务，并命其南征大理国。
description.en: Appointed his younger brother Kublai to oversee military and political affairs in Northern China and ordered him to conquer the Dali Kingdom to the south.

description.zh-cn: 奉蒙哥之命率军南征，攻克大理城，灭亡大理国。
description.en: Under Möngke's order, he led an army south, captured the city of Dali, and destroyed the Dali Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 作为大理国王，在忽必烈攻克大理城后投降。
description.en: As the king of Dali, he surrendered after Kublai captured the capital city.

description.zh-cn: 命令其弟旭烈兀率领大军西征。
description.en: Ordered his younger brother Hulagu to lead a large army to the west.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀西征军于1256年攻灭位于波斯西部的木剌夷国（阿萨辛派）。
description.en: Hulagu's expeditionary army destroyed the Nizari Ismaili state (Assassins) in western Persia in 1256.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀西征军于1258年攻陷巴格达，灭亡阿拔斯王朝。
description.en: Hulagu's expeditionary army captured Baghdad in 1258, destroying the Abbasid Caliphate.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀西征军于1260年攻占叙利亚，灭亡阿尤布王朝。
description.en: Hulagu's expeditionary army captured Syria in 1260, destroying the Ayyubid dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 因蒙哥去世，旭烈兀东返途中留在西亚自成一方，建立了伊儿汗国。
description.en: Due to Möngke's death, Hulagu remained in West Asia during his return journey and established the Ilkhanate.

description.zh-cn: 1258年，蒙哥亲率主力大举进攻南宋四川地区。
description.en: In 1258, Möngke personally led the main army in a major invasion of the Sichuan region of the Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥亲率的蒙古大军在钓鱼城下受阻数月，蒙哥本人最终在此役中身亡。
description.en: The Mongol army personally led by Möngke was bogged down at Diaoyu Fortress for several months, and Möngke himself eventually died during this battle.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥在钓鱼城之战中去世，直接引发了其弟忽必烈与阿里不哥之间争夺汗位的内战。
description.en: Möngke's death during the Battle of Diaoyu Fortress directly triggered a civil war for the succession to the khanship between his younger brothers Kublai and Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 这场内战标志着蒙古帝国走向分裂，各汗国开始独立发展。
description.en: This civil war marked the beginning of the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire, as the various khanates began to develop independently.

description.zh-cn: 派遣传教士卢布鲁克前往东方觐见蒙古大汗。
description.en: Dispatched the missionary William of Rubruck to the East for an audience with the Great Khan of the Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王路易九世派遣的传教士卢布鲁克到达蒙哥的营地并觐见了他。
description.en: The missionary William of Rubruck, sent by King Louis IX of France, arrived at Möngke's camp and had an audience with him.

description.zh-cn: 作为蒙古的属国国王，海屯一世前往哈拉和林朝见蒙哥。
description.en: As the king of a Mongol vassal state, Hethum I traveled to Karakorum for an audience with Möngke.

description.zh-cn: 小亚美尼亚王国于1244年归附大蒙古国，成为其属国。
description.en: The Armenian Kingdom of Cilicia submitted to the Mongol Empire in 1244, becoming its vassal state.

description.zh-cn: 元朝建立后，忽必烈追尊蒙哥庙号为宪宗，谥号为桓肃皇帝。
description.en: After the establishment of the Yuan Dynasty, Kublai Khan posthumously honored Möngke with the temple name Xianzong and the posthumous title Emperor Huansu.
